mapper.select: SELECT `order_id` as orderId, `user_id` as userId, `total_amount` as totalAmount, `delivery_address` as deliveryAddress, `order_status` as orderStatus, `create_time` as createTime FROM `order` WHERE `user_id` = #{userId} ORDER BY `create_time` DESC

SELECT `order_id` as orderId, `user_id` as userId, `total_amount` as totalAmount, `delivery_address` as deliveryAddress, `order_status` as orderStatus, `create_time` as createTime FROM `order` WHERE `order_status` = #{status} ORDER BY `create_time` DESC

SELECT `order_id` as orderId, `user_id` as userId, `total_amount` as totalAmount, `delivery_address` as deliveryAddress, `order_status` as orderStatus, `create_time` as createTime FROM `order` ORDER BY `create_time` DESC

SELECT `order_id` as orderId, `user_id` as userId, `total_amount` as totalAmount, `delivery_address` as deliveryAddress, `order_status` as orderStatus, `create_time` as createTime FROM `order` WHERE `order_status` = '待支付' AND `create_time` < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE `order_status` = '待支付' OR `order_status` = '待发货'

SELECT `order_id` as orderId, `user_id` as userId, `total_amount` as totalAmount, `delivery_address` as deliveryAddress, `order_status` as orderStatus, `create_time` as createTime FROM `order` WHERE `order_status` IN ('待支付', '待发货', '待退款') ORDER BY `create_time` DESC

SELECT o.`order_id` as orderId, o.`user_id` as userId, o.`total_amount` as totalAmount, o.`delivery_address` as deliveryAddress, o.`order_status` as orderStatus, o.`create_time` as createTime FROM `order` o JOIN `user` u ON o.`user_id` = u.`user_id` WHERE 1=1
AND (o.`order_id` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.`username` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND o.`order_status` = #{status}
ORDER BY o.`create_time` DESC
